Posts.Content: Thanks so much for your reply.  Is there a link you could send me (havent heard of before)!! Lots love, Chris xx
Posts.Title: meet up

Posts.Content: Hi, just reading your posts and meeting up.  I live in Salisbury (Wiltshire).  Had bc  two and a half years ago, (after a year of moving here and didnt know anyone).  I have been retired for a year, and although with partner, would love to meet someone like minded who has suffered this awful thing too. Sending you all love, on this Easter Sunday!!xx
Posts.Title: meet up

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply!!  Waterloo station is where our trains go to!  Not familiar with venue but would be ok if near a tube station.  Yes I could start a link for local area, (not too sure how to do that but will have a look). I have friends who have had bc but none of them live near, so it's not saying 'let's meet up for a coffee in town this week' as we need to plan weeks' ahead to meet.  However I am grateful for this site - I couldnt even look at it the first year after being diagnosed, everything scared me rigid (still does but not so bad).  Any little thing I have I think it is the cancer come back.  I know I am not the only one who thinks that, and that in itself is just so helpful!! Lots love again,  Chris xx ps Happy Easter to you too, and lovely ladies reading this.
Posts.Title: meet up
